wikipedia_page.main: Max Clark (born 3 October 1995) is a Welsh-born professional rugby union footballer who plays at centre for Bath in the Aviva Premiership.Clark was born in Bridgend to a Welsh mother and English father.

response: * Max Clark, professional rugby player at Bath Rugbyhttp://www.bathrugby.com/team/academy/academy-squad/max-clark
* On 18 May 2018, Josh Clackstone, Greg Luer, David Meyler and Greg Olley were released by the club, while Max Clark, Abel Hernández, Sebastian Larsson and Moses Odubajo were offered new deals.
* On 22 June 2018, Max Clark was reported as joining Vitesse Arnhem at the end of his contract.
